data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Platia, Giuseppe, Ghahari, Hassan (2016): An annotated checklist of click-beetles (Coleoptera, Elateridae) from Iran. Zootaxa 4137 (2): 239-275, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.2.6
